fields.original_string:
private static final String TEST_SCRIPT =
        "code1 ;--comment
" +                           // code with an inline comment
        " code2; --comment
" +                          // code with an inline comment
        "	code3; -- comment
" +                        // code with an inline comment
        "-- comment
" +                                 // just a comment
        " -- comment
" +                                // just a comment
        "code4	;
" +                                   // one statement
        " code5 ; code6;
" +                            // line with two statements
        "code7; // comment
" +                          // code with C style comment
        "/* comment */ code8;
" +                       // multiline comment in a single line followed by code
        "/** comment
 comment
 comment **/ code9;" +   // multi line comment followed by code
        "	code /* comment */ code10;
" +               // code with comments
        "code
 code,
 code
 code
 code
 code11 ;" + // multiline code
        " code12	; # comment
" +                       // code followed by MySQL style single line comment
        " 

;
";
